intro.message-part-1: I build accessible, inclusive products and digital experiences for the web.
intro.message-part-2: I enjoy taking on new challenges and collaborating with other developers to create innovative and impactful products that solve real-world problems.
intro.title: I am Kain Nhantumbo!

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Web Developer & Content Creator
about.intro-1: I am a person with a desire to grow by learning new things every day. Driven by curiosity, I fell in love with web development and design.
about.intro-2: I am very interested in opportunities to work with the latest technologies on challenging projects that would push my skills to the limit. I like programming, and I am especially ambitious about the kind of projects that solve daily problems.

carousel.label: Some of the tools I usually use

services.title: Discover My Services
services.subtitle: There are a variety of ways that I can help and boost your business, that's why I customize every software solution to match your specific needs. You can count on me to deliver a system supporting your business's growth.

types.title: Web Applications
types.content: Need access to your application across many locations? I am an expert at building web applications.

types.title: Legacy Application Upgrades
types.content: It's hard transitioning away from old systems. That's why I focus on creating a seamless transition.

types.title: Desktop Applications
types.content: Do you want to handle everything internally? I can make that happen for you.

types.title: Automations
types.content: Save time and money for your business by automating and streamlining repetitive tasks.

types.title: Security & Speed
types.content: I know how valuable security and speed is. That's why it is one of the top priorities for all applications I build by leveraging the right tools for your project.

types.title: Enterprise Solutions
types.content: Are you seeking a solution for your large-scale team? Don't hesitate to reach out, and I'll be more than happy to assist.

projects.title: My Projects and Works
projects.description: Each project is a unique piece of development üéè. You can see all my personal projects on my GitHub profile.

content.maron-themes: Visual Studio Code Theme extension pack made with VSCode Theming API
content.we-commerce: Full-featured e-commerce store, crafted with Next.js, Nest.js, Node.js, TailwindCSS, and Typescript.
content.bug-tracker: Bug Tracker App built with React.js and Typescript
content.bug-tracker-server: Bug Tracker Restful API built with Typescript, Node.JS + Express.JS + MongoDB on the Back-end
content.url-shortner: Url Shortner App, built with Node.js and Express.js (backend), React.js and Typescript (frontend).
content.notes-app: Notes App made with React.JS + Styled-Components + Sass
content.tasks-app: Contacts and Tasks Application made with JavaScript, React.js, and Node.js + Express.js + MongoDB on the back-end
content.tasks-app-server: Server Restful API for Contacts and Tasks App, made with JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB
content.barber-shop-website: Barber Shop  Website made using Typescript, React.js, and Tailwindcss
content.restaurant-demo: Restaurant Website made using React.js and Typescript + Tailwindcss
content.hagira-store-server: Server Restful API for Hagira E-commerce Website, made with JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB

contact.title: Contact me
contact.intro-title: Let's bring ideas to life with code!
contact.intro-phrase: Hi! I'm here to help people turn their ideas into reality. If you are stuck on a project, want to start something new, or need some advice on where to go from here, I'd love to talk it over with you and see what we can do together. Feel free to contact me for more info!

works.title: Recent Work
works.description: A collection of my most recent projects

choconotey.title: Choconotey Notes App
choconotey.description:
Taking notes in markdown is made simple with this application. It provides the core features to create, organize, filter, share, and export/output your notes content in multiple formats like Markdown, HTML, and plain text.
Jammed with auto sync, app and data control settings, soft layout animations, a robust editor, and a clean interface for ease  and distraction-free experience.
Good to give it a try! üéàüéâüéä

toono.title: Toono Community
toono.description:
Meet a social constructive content-oriented platform inspired by dev.to that allows people around the globe to share their career experience and grow by writing valuable content, build their professional profiles, and take part in social discussions. All mates are welcome to find a place within our community.
A platform made for everyone who wants to share, contribute, and learn something. ü•≥

palletone.title: Palletone Colors App
palletone.description:
This app aims to bring a new experience of collecting, managing, and building color palettes for designers and web developers.
The main goal is to simplify the process, providing the right tools for choosing the preferred color for their project.
Feel free to try it on any device of yours and bake your own color flavor for your next project! ü•≥

rubymart.title: Rubymart Platform
rubymart.description:
Imagine an open platform where anyone can power their businesses by constructing a community of customers, sell products, create user and store profiles, rate products, offer jobs, share ideas, and make real connections!
This is the app that accomplishes it.
A perfect fusion of e-commerce and social community business platform.
 Explore my GitHub for more!
